Reviews.Title: I need a working phone
Reviews.Author: mark s mirek
Reviews.Content: When I'm trying to dial a number the phone shuts off. Also, I put it in my pants pocket, turned on and take it out, turned off. I am sure I charge it whole day, every day, and I use it very, very, very little, so I'm not giving the battery any hard time, whatsoever. The battery shows that it's fully charged, too. The phone has a solid flip case so there is no possibility of my pushing any buttons when I'm not using it; it just turns off by it's self. I need a phone for basic communications about what to get in a grocery store or just in case of an emergency. But this phone isn't even good for those things. I have to get a new phone, now. I wish I can have my money back for this utter lemon.
